review_details:
Petros is a very polite guy that he helped us with our selection for our trip. The choice was Polyaigos and it was very beautiful indeed.
The boats were very clean and new. Petros is very cooperative and always with a smile in his face.we enjoyed it a lot and the next year we will do it again!!!
It was a very nice experience with fresh fish and a lot of tasty traditional food of milos with a perfect company
